thread.title: K’taka minister receives threat call, files complaint
thread.title_full: K’taka minister receives threat call, files complaint

author: tribuneindia.com
title: K’taka minister receives threat call, files complaint
text:
Tribune News Service
Bengaluru, October 25
Karnataka minister K Abhayachandra Jain has lodged a police complaint in Mangalore about receiving a threat call in connection with the recent murder of Bajran Dal activist Prashant Poojary. Poojary, who sold flowers near a temple, was involved in busting illegal cattle slaughter houses in Mangalore. The Sports, Youth Affairs and Fisheries Minister claimed a person identifying himself as gangster Ravi Pujari called him yesterday and said he (the minister) was involved in the murder of Prashant Poojary. The caller then told the minister that he would kill him. The caller also alleged Mangalore district-in-charge minister Ramanath Rai was also involved in the murder. Jain told the police that the caller spoke in Hindi and English.
